about_the_game:
What are the top things eroge protagonists do when they happen upon a hypnosis app? #1 Get Laid. #2 Get Revenge. We're going for an Ero Games Done Quick record by hypnotizing your bully's mom into becoming your personal loving, devoted mommy onahole!

Fuck Aika while you convince your former bully to watch! Fuck her behind her husbands back, all while Aika falls deeper under your spell and more in love with your cock!



For the first time EVER we have English voice acting for one of our games!
  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Aika is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue AND original English Voice Acting!
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 14 hypnotic sex scenes with Aika!

    Hypno Mama Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

    **PLEASE NOTE**
    All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Got my bully's mom on speed dial~
She's naked for easy access, of course!
You wouldn't refuse a gift, right?
Time to play with one of my favorite toys!
A wholesome little stroll around town

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- Characters engage in BDSM, elements including; domination, sexual accessories. bondage, and impact play.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Contains mind control/brainwashing.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

name: Hypno Mama

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
